name: Magipanels
description:
Gameboy's 2020 GOTY
Magipanels is a new take on the match 3 genre where you increment either a row or a column of panels, attempting to match 3 or more adjacent panels of the highest value. But be careful. If you increment a panel too many times, you'll take damage and render that panel unusable for the rest of the game.
With a total of 3 characters, 5 panel skins, and 3 songs, you can customize your play experience to suit your style.How to playIncrement the panels until you get them to their highest value (5 for the default dice-themed skin). When you get 3 or more adjacent panels with the highest value, they turn into point tiles (the rabbit in the hat for the default dice-themed skin). Increment a score tile to earn 1 point, and to refresh it to a panel of a random value. Rinse and repeat as you strive to earn a high score.
If you increment a panel that's already at the max value, you'll take 1 heart of damage and that panel will be unusable for the rest of the game (the "X" in the default dice-themed skin).
If you lose all 7 hearts, it's game over!
Download it today!
Check out that amazing 144p dice roll animation! Or, rather, check out a single frame from said animation!
I shouldn't be showing you these unlockable spoilers, so don't tell anyone that you saw them early.
Contrary to popular belief, QuestionMan is not a playable character.
What motivates you to keep playing? High scores? Unlockables? It doesn't matter, because Magipanels has both!
As determined by a panel of esteemed gaming experts, of which I'm the only member.
